title: Shanghai Disneyland is shut down, and 30000 people are tested, after one COVID case
content:
1. Shanghai Disneyland is shut down, and 30000 people are tested, after one COVID case  NPR
  2. Shanghai's Halloween Lockdown Becomes a Disney Nightmare as 30000 Are Detained in Theme Park Virus Scare  The Daily Beast
  3. COVID-19 scare forces Shanghai Disney into lockdown after woman tests positive l ABC7  ABC7
  4. China Locks 30,000 Visitors Inside Shanghai Disneyland After One Guest Got Covid-19  The Wall Street Journal
  5. China's leisure, tourism feel chilly grip of COVID curbs  Reuters

localize.title: 上海ディズニーランドが閉鎖され、30000人が検査を受ける、1件のCOVID事件を受けて
